# ConsoleBitTestBackend

This project is a task from ConsoleBit for Django Backend Developer.

## Important Links
[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/18816679-2ed05858-e50b-409a-85ed-b28c591c1ae8?action=collection%2Ffork&collection-url=entityId%3D18816679-2ed05858-e50b-409a-85ed-b28c591c1ae8%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3D20f147c1-e329-4f9a-b5dd-8081a24a3858#?env%5BConsoleBit%)

Backend URL: https://consolebit.theether.in

## All available endpoints: 
- /auth/register/
- /auth/token/
- /auth/token/refresh/
- /auth/token/verify/
- /products/
- /products/?ordering=field_name
- /products/?page=int&page_size=int
- /products/?min_price=int
